paper_abstract: Mixed graphs have both directed and undirected edges and have received considerable attention in the literature. We study two upward planarity testing problems for embedded mixed graphs, give some NP-hardness results, and describe Integer Linear Programming techniques to solve them. Experiments show the efficiency of our approach. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Upward and quasi-upward planarity testing of embedded mixed graphs
